text: True Lies is a 1994 action movie. The movie is about a computer salesman who does covert missions for the United States government. Arnold Schwarzenegger plays Harry. Jamie Lee Curtis plays Harry's wife Helen. Tom Arnold plays Harry's collegue and friend Albert. Eliza Dushku plays Harry's daughter Dana. This movie got positive movie reviews from the movie critics. It made a lot of money at the box office. True Lies was the first movie made with a budget of over $100 million dollars. ==References== == Other websites == * * Category:1994 action movies Category:1994 movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American action movies Category:Movies about terrorism Category:Movies about nuclear war and weapons Category:Movies set in Switzerland Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Movies set in Florida
title: True Lies
